grocery.welcome: Welcome to the network. You're joining {count} grocery stores serving communities across New Jersey.
grocery.insight: Grocery stores in your area average {rating} stars. Customers prioritize fresh selection, local sourcing, and convenient shopping experiences.
grocery.opportunity: Your area shows strong demand for specialty and health-focused products. {percentage}% of nearby competitors don't emphasize organic or local options.

convenience.welcome: Welcome to the network. You're joining {count} convenience stores serving on-the-go customers daily.
convenience.insight: Convenience stores in your area average {rating} stars. Fast checkout and fresh food options are key differentiators.
convenience.opportunity: Peak demand periods in your area are 7-9am and 5-7pm. Prepared food and beverage programs can increase transaction values significantly.

foodservice.welcome: Welcome to the network. You're joining {count} food service establishments delighting customers across New Jersey.
foodservice.insight: Restaurants and cafes in your area average {rating} stars. Menu variety, dietary options, and atmosphere drive customer loyalty.
foodservice.opportunity: Your demographic shows strong preference for diverse cuisines and health-conscious options. Digital ordering capabilities are becoming table stakes.

gas.welcome: Welcome to the network. You're joining {count} fuel stations serving drivers throughout New Jersey.
gas.insight: Gas stations in your area average {rating} stars. Clean facilities, loyalty programs, and convenience offerings matter most to customers.
gas.opportunity: Stations with attached convenience stores see 60% higher per-visit revenue. Your area also shows growing interest in EV charging infrastructure.

liquor.welcome: Welcome to the network. You're joining {count} wine and spirits retailers across New Jersey.
liquor.insight: Liquor stores in your area average {rating} stars. Selection depth, knowledgeable staff, and discovery experiences drive repeat business.
liquor.opportunity: Your demographic favors craft and local products over mass-market brands. Curated selections and tasting events differentiate top performers.

tobacco_smoke.insight: Specialty stores in your area average {rating} stars. Product variety, compliance excellence, and customer service drive loyalty.
tobacco_smoke.opportunity: Alternative product categories are growing fastest in your market. Premium positioning maintains margins in competitive environments.
